name: HENTAI IDOL
description:
Hentai is not just love 2d chan, it's much bigger than you think! In the game "hentai idol" you will see 15 beautiful girls! You need a bit of logic to see all the beauty, and there's patience. You are waiting for puzzles 3х3,4х4,5х5, achievements, nice pictures. Only here, only now!
Bring blocks of images to get a full image!
